title: Episode 109: Correlation and Causation
description: Looking for examples of correlation and causation?  You've heard it a million times: correlation doesn't mean causation.  Here's a humorous look at this topic that I think really drives home the point.  We'll explore whether satisfied workers are more productive and whether living together causes divorce.
